title: Can we stop giving new champions stupid names?
body: We had Taliya with a silent "H", Jin with another silent "H", and now "Kled" which is just totally stupid. Im surprised its not "Khled" or "Klehd" or "Kledd", but still its dumb.

replies.body: This is how you can tell you have a south/central US resident; they think anything not spelled phonetically is stupid. If asked what 'phonetic' means, they will A: call you a retard, or B: say something about your mother.
I dont live in the South or Central US but ok. Why does llama have 2 L's? Its stupid.

> [{quoted}](name=Caítlyn,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=LxydGuPr,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-07-26T02:47:19.344+0000)
>
> I dont live in the South or Central US but ok. Why does llama have 2 L's? Its stupid.

It's a foreign word and it's to emphasize an elongation to the "L" sound.
Just in the manner that TaliyAH puts an emphasis on the last "A," due to the H. and how JHIn puts extra emphasis on the "I" because of the H.
 The H's aren't silent because if you actually know how language works, you understand how they contribute to the words.
I bet your name is Robert... or bob or something. Also your summoner name is stupid too, so i guess as soon as you change that, they MIGHT consider.
Kled is just stupid in general.

I havent even cared about him after I saw his name and the picture showing he was another of these dumb "cute lil monster" champs like {{champion:150}} 

Trying to sell more plush toys

They wouldn't spend money on devs, an art team and in game assets to make a character just to sell toys. That's what TV shows do, make cheap cartoons to sell toys, not a full character in a game that took months to make.
